dcterms:creator: J. Chen
N. Skatchkovsky
O. Simeone
dcterms:description: A comprehensive design for a neuromorphic wireless Internet of Things (IoT) system that combines spike-based sensing, processing, and communication, allowing energy consumption to adjust according to the monitored environmentâ€™s dynamics while maintaining low-latency inference.
dcterms:title: Neuromorphic Wireless Internet of Things (IoT) System

dcterms:creator: S. Park
S. Kim
B. Na
S. Yoon
dcterms:description: A fast and energy-efficient TTFS coding scheme that employs an exponentially decaying dynamic threshold to transform the magnitude of the input signal into first spike patterns.
dcterms:title: Time-to-First-Spike (TTFS) Coding Scheme

dcterms:creator: J. Kim
H. Kim
S. Huh
J. Lee
K. Choi
dcterms:description: A straightforward phase coding method that transforms the amplitudes of the input signal into their binary form, incorporating phase details into the spikes by giving distinct weights to each bit in the burst.
dcterms:title: Phase Coding Method

dcterms:creator: E. M. Izhikevich
N. S. Desai
E. C. Walcott
F. C. Hoppensteadt
dcterms:description: A coding scheme that allows for rapid and efficient data transmission by emitting a cluster of spikes simultaneously, enhancing the reliability of synaptic communication between neurons.
dcterms:title: Burst Coding Scheme

dcterms:creator: E. Goldoni
L. Prando
A. Vizziello
P. Savazzi
P. Gamba
dcterms:description: An experimental dataset analyzing RSSI-based indoor and outdoor localization in LoRa networks.
dcterms:title: RSSI-based Indoor and Outdoor Localization

dcterms:creator: P. Savazzi
E. Goldoni
A. Vizziello
L. Favalli
P. Gamba
dcterms:description: A localization algorithm that exploits modulation diversity in LoRa networks using a Wiener-based approach.
dcterms:title: RSSI Localization Algorithm

dcterms:creator: R. R. Guerra
A. Vizziello
P. Savazzi
E. Goldoni
P. Gamba
dcterms:description: A dataset for forecasting LoRaWAN RSSI using weather parameters, comparing artificial intelligence and hybrid approaches.
dcterms:title: Weather Parameters for RSSI Forecasting
